ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 7th Coldain Prayer Shawl
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah. I think the whole Death Squad triggering thing is kindof stupid. It shouldn t be that difficult to find Tanik. I had help from a high level necro. He
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah. I think the whole Death Squad triggering thing is kindof stupid. It
shouldn't be that difficult to find Tanik. I had help from a high level
necro. He used his pet to find the location of the guy and upon making sure
it wasn't the Death Squad, he brought me over to do the hand in.
luv,
-Su

> Yeah, the 4th shawl is the death squad. I get so tired
> of wandering around, hoping to trip over that dwarf,
> lol.
>
> Snow griffin eggs are the last part of the 3rd shawl.
> Also boring, but at least you're killing stuff. :)
>
